title: Visit the National Zoo
snippet:
3001 Connecticut Ave NW, Washington, DC 20008
The orangutans aren't fenced in and they can climb around the park.  Also, pandas are the hot item.

title: Tour the National Mall
snippet:
800 Madison Dr NW, Washington, DC 20408
Everything is free.  Actually, you are all paying for it.. but we can discuss that later.

title: Visit the Capital building
snippet:
First St SE, Washington, DC 20004
If you plan early enough you can get a tour, but the grounds are pretty cool to walk around.

title: Walk through Gerogetown
snippet:
Wisconsin Ave NW & M St NW Washington, DC 20007
Just make sure you pop your collar first.

title: Kennedy Center
snippet:
2700 F St NW, Washington, DC 20566
Catch a show, there's free stuff at the Millenium stage every day.

title: Hike Great Falls Park
snippet:
9200 Old Dominion Dr, McLean, VA 22102
One of those things tourists don't get a chance to do when they visit, but there's lots of good hiking in the DC area. Check it out!

title: Newseum
snippet:
555 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC 20001
It's not cheap, but it's one of the best museums in DC.  Look around online for discounts ala groupon.
